import React, { useState } from 'react'; function EditUserSection(props) { const [userObject, setUserObject] = useState(props.userToEdit); const handleChangeUser = (e) => { setUserObject( { [e.target.name]: e.target.value } ) } const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault(); alert(`Submitting Name ${JSON.stringify(userObject)}`) } return (

Edit User

{JSON.stringify(userObject)}

This username is available

This email is invalid

); } export default EditUserSection;
